content:
I've installed [Barnaby Walters](http://waterpigs.co.uk/)' clever [Weave](http://waterpigs.co.uk/notes/4SUHfc/) browser extension for Twitter.com to expand truncated POSSE tweet copies of #IndieWeb posts. 

If you're viewing this on my site or on the Twitter website with Weave then you should be reading my whole post, not just the ~140-character summary.
